reference.title: Coffee recipes
reference.shortdesc: Try these recipes on your espresso machine.

dlentry.dd: Intense and aromatic, an espresso or short black uses about 7g of ground coffee. It is served in a small cup or glass to a level of approximately 30ml.
A long black is served as a standard espresso with hot water added to taste.
A single dose of espresso in a cup topped with steamed milk, 1⁄3 coffee and 1⁄3 milk.
This blend of 1⁄3 espresso to 2⁄3 milk is made with a single shot of espresso. Top with steamed milk, poured down the inside rim of the glass to give a creamy consistency.
Served lukewarm with 1⁄3 espresso to 1⁄3 steamed milk and a generous final third of creamy froth.
A shot of espresso served short in a 70ml demitasse and stained with a dash of finely frothed milk.
